name: Lexicon Pharmaceuticals, Inc.
description: Lexicon Pharmaceuticals, Inc. is a biopharmaceutical company focused on the discovery and development of innovative therapies for human disease. Founded in 1995, Lexicon is headquartered in The Woodlands, Texas. The company employs its proprietary gene-knockout technology to identify and develop drug candidates that target various unmet medical needs. Lexicon's most notable product is sotagliflozin, a dual SGLT1 and SGLT2 inhibitor, which has shown promise in treating diabetes and heart failure. The company aims to create breakthroughs in the treatment of metabolic, cardiovascular, and neurodegenerative diseases through its robust pipeline of drug candidates. Lexicon is committed to advancing the understanding of the underlying mechanisms of disease to develop targeted therapies that improve patient outcomes. Collaboration with academic and pharmaceutical partners is a core strategy to facilitate the progression of its innovative therapies. With a vision to translate scientific discoveries into meaningful therapies, Lexicon continues to enhance its research and development capabilities while prioritizing patient safety and efficacy in all its clinical trials.
